PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-00022010-01-13,  ,  ,  CRA, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectBoris Shmorgun and Eduard Shmorgun Remission Order
PrecisINDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER remits the amount of $31,150, plus related penalties and interest, representing tax payable under Division II of Part IX of the Excise Tax Act to BORIS SHMORGUN and EDUARD SHMORGUN in respect of the purchase of a commercial building in March 1998.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2010-0002 Publication Date: 2010-02-03
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Boris Shmorgun and Eduard Shmorgun Remission Order
precis: INDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER remits the amount of $31,150, plus related penalties and interest, representing tax payable under Division II of Part IX of the Excise Tax Act to BORIS SHMORGUN and EDUARD SHMORGUN in respect of the purchase of a commercial building in March 1998.
